patterns: What is SEO and why is it important for businesses
What is the importance of SEO
responses: SEO stands for Search Engine Optimization. It is a set of practices to improve visibility and ranking of sites in search results. A good SEO strategy is essential for attracting quality organic traffic.

patterns: Why do we need web design
responses: Web design is the process of creating the appearance and layout of a site. It differs from web development, which focuses on coding and functionality.
Digital marketing uses online channels (social media, SEO, email, etc.) to promote products and services. It is essential for reaching audiences effectively, both online and offline.
Digital solutions include applications, gateways, sensors, and more. They improve the customer experience while optimizing costs and processes.
Customer Relationship Management (CRM) helps manage interactions between a business and its customers, aiming to strengthen relationships and improve retention and profitability.

patterns: What is an e-commerce site and how to create one
How to create an e-commerce site
responses: E-commerce sites allow consumers and businesses to buy and sell online. These platforms are characterized by transactions carried out exclusively via the Internet.
Pay-Per-Click (PPC) is an online marketing method that attracts traffic and encourages conversions through search engines. When well managed, PPC can attract many new customers.

patterns: how to create a WordPress site
responses: WordPress is a CMS that allows creating and hosting websites. With its plugin and template architecture, it adapts to the needs of blogs, portfolios, or online stores.
Social Media Marketing (SMM) uses social platforms to build a brand, increase sales, and attract visitors. SMM includes analytics to measure and improve performance.
